instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ATOMIC ENERGY AND ALTERNATIVE ENERGIES COMMISSION. Summary: Market for Supplies of Ceramic Plates Composed of Oxides. Description: This Contract concerns the supply by the Contractor to the CEA of ceramic plates mixed with two oxides. The quantity to be supplied is of the order of a hundred thousand. Two types of ceramic materials, with variable dimensions and compositions (of the order of a centimeter) are the subject of this mark. These dimensions will be defined prior to the Contract. The chemical nature of the two ceramic matrices will be communicated by the Contract Specifications at the Call for Tender stage. <br> The manufacturing process and the associated means of control are developed by the CEA prior to theMarket. As such, the CEA will deliver to the Holder of the Contract, during its engagement, a book of the Processes. The process will mainly describe the steps of manufacturing the oxide powder, pressing these same powders, and then sintering. The Holder must have adequate means of manufacturingcation and control of these plaques. The checks will be dimensional, geometric (density), visual and physico-chemical (composition, impurities). The Market will include a phase of acquisition and qualification of these means of manufacture and control. The Holder will also be responsible for apprsupply of the raw materials necessary for the services (for the ceramic matrices). As an option, a study of the robustness of the process developed by the CEA may be requested and additional quantities of ceramic plates may be ordered.<br> Doc Title: Chemical mineral.... Published Date: 2023-02-15. Closing Date: 2023-03-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: ATOMIC ENERGY AND ALTERNATIVE ENERGIES COMMISSION

input: Country: France. Purchaser Name: ATOMIC ENERGY AND ALTERNATIVE ENERGIES COMMISSION (75015 - PARIS). Summary: Market for Supplies of Ceramic Plates Composed of Oxides. Description: Title: Contract for the supply of ceramic slabs composed of oxides<br> Subject: This Contract concerns the supply by the Contractor to the CEA of ceramic slabs made up of two oxides. The quantity to be supplied is of the order of a hundred thousand. Two types of ceramic materials, with dimlengths and variable compositions (of the order of a centimeter) are the subject of this market. These dimensions will be defined prior to the Contract. The chemical nature of the two ceramic matrices will be communicated by the Contract Specifications at the Tender stage. The manufacturing processation and the associated means of control, are developed by the CEA prior to the Contract. As such, the CEA will deliver to the Holder of the Contract, during its engagement, a book of the Processes. The process will mainly describe the steps of manufacturing the oxide powder, pressing these sames powders, then sintering. The Holder must have adequate means of manufacturing and checking these plates. The checks will be dimensional, geometric (density), visual and physico-chemical (composition, impurities). The Contract will include a procurement and qualification phase.one of these means of manufacture and control. The Contractor will also be responsible for the supply of the raw materials necessary for the services (for the ceramic matrices). As an option, a study of the robustness of the process developed by the CEA may be requested and additional quantities.... Published Date: 2023-01-12. Closing Date: 2023-02-28. Competition: ICB.
